<<<<<<< HEAD
The Christian conflict and conquest set forth in a sermon at Pauls-crosse, upon Sunday the 19th of Iuly, 1635. By W.E.B.D. of St Mary Hall in Oxford Evans, William, b. 1598 or 9.
[8], 70, [2] p.
Printed by Leonard Lichfield, and are to be sold by William Webb, Oxford : A.D. 1636.
W.E. = William Evans. To the reader signed: William Evans. Signatures: [A]-K⁴ (-A1 and K4, blanks?). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
